verbs.description: After [ARG0: President Trump and North Korean strongman Kim Jong Un] [V: agreed] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , during a historic summit in Singapore , to recover the remains of the U.S. military personnel missing in action and presumed dead from the war , families whose husbands and fathers are still MIA are hopeful that almost 68 years later , their remains will soon be returned to U.S. soil .
